item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I’m Herena Li, a developer and artist from Hong Kong. I’m currently specialising in Computer Science and minoring in Linguistics at the University of Toronto. Languages Python, Javascript, HTML/CSS, R Tools Visual Studio Code, PyCharm Interests I’m still relatively new to programming, but right now I’m most interested in web development! Other than that, I’m interested in learning more about natural language processing (NLP). Outside of computer science, I like drawing and doing digital art!
